#summary find_not_processed - finds files in a directory which are not listed in a log file

= Usage =

`find_not_processed <options> `



= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||*Argument*||*Description*||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-d||--directory||<directory> ||directory to look for files in (required)||
||-l||--logfile||<logfile> ||file containing names of already-processed files (required)||
||-p||--print-dir|| ||print the full file path (default: just the name)||
||-g||--glob||<glob> ||only look for files matching this shell-style pattern||
||-r||--regex||<regex> ||only look for files matching this regular expression||
